climbs.name: Not to be Taken for Granite
climbs.fa: Adam Pierce, George Smith, Dan Briley, Al Hide, Jon DeBoer

content.description: Start at the base of a wide crack, after a couple of feet step left onto the face to a bolt. Climb the face between the cracks to the top past a seam and one more bolt. Belay with gear.
content.protection: Two bolts, cams micro up to 2".
content.location: At the south end of Paiute Crags, on the darker brown patinated slabs, climb the narrow face between the two most obvious cracks.

climbs.name: Crowd Pleaser
climbs.fa: Unkown, most likely Joe Herbst or Stephanie Janiga

content.description: Climb a left-leaning crack to a ledge then up easier broken cracks to the right.
content.location: The obvious left-leaning crack on the far right end of the long Paiute Crags wall.

content.description: The south end of the long broken cliff band on the hillside just above the Paiute Boulders.
